hibernate-mapping.query: from Contact C where C.AssetManager.Key = :assetManagerId and C.Key not in (:excludedKeys) and C.CurrentNAW.Name like :name and (C.Key in (select CP.Key from ContactPerson CP where CP.BurgerServiceNummer like :number) or C.Key in (select CC.Key from ContactCompany CC where CC.KvKNumber like :number)) order by C.CurrentNAW.Name
from AccountTypeCustomer A where A.AccountOwner.Key = :assetManagerId and A.Key not in (:excludedKeys) and A.Number like :number and A.ShortName like :name order by A.ShortName
